prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her (then) husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her (then) husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What are Stefan's thoughts feelings and intentions towards me in this moment?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a structured list of the horary chart data relevant for a traditional horary analysis of your question (“What are Stefan’s thoughts, feelings, and intentions towards me in this moment?”) using the established horary principles. In this chart Melissa (you) is represented by the Ascendant (1st house) and Stefan by the 9th house cusp (foreign connection, here in Scorpio).

1. Planetary Positions and House Placements
 • Ascendant (Melissa) at 14° Aquarius; 1st house contains:
  – Sun at 29°03′ Aquarius
  – Mercury at 5°30′ Pisces
  – Saturn at 19°18′ Pisces
  – Neptune at 28°29′ Pisces
  – North Node at 28°58′ Pisces (retrograde as indicated by “r”)
 • 2nd House (starts at 4° Aries): Contains Venus at 7°55′ Aries and Chiron at 20°05′ Aries
 • 3rd House (starts at 12° Taurus): Contains Uranus at 23°24′ Taurus
 • 4th House (starts at 4° Gemini): Contains Jupiter at 11°33′ Gemini
 • 5th House (starts at 22° Gemini)
 • 6th House (starts at 12° Cancer): Contains Mars at 17°17′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • 7th House (starts at 14° Leo)
 • 8th House (starts at 4° Libra): Contains Moon at 23°53′ Libra
 • 9th House (Stefan as foreign significator; starts at 12° Scorpio)
 • 10th House (starts at 4° Sagittarius)
 • 11th House (starts at 22° Sagittarius)
 • 12th House (starts at 12° Capricorn): Contains Pluto at 2°33′ Aquarius

2. Key Planetary Rulership for the Significators
 • Melissa (Ascendant in Aquarius): Governed by Saturn; many key planets lie in or affect the 1st house.
 • Stefan (9th house in Scorpio): Traditionally ruled by Mars. Mars is in Cancer (6th house) and retrograde, which is notable for the analysis.

3. Major Aspects (with orbs noted)
 • MC Opposition IC (orb 0°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb 0°)
 • Mercury Square IC (orb 1°)
 • Mercury Square MC (orb 1°)
 • Pluto Sextile MC (orb 2°)
 • Pluto Trine IC (orb 2°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb 2°)
 • Venus Sextile IC (orb 3°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb 3°)
 • Moon Opposition Chiron (orb 3°)
 • Jupiter Trine Ascendant (orb 3°)
 • Venus Trine MC (orb 3°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb 4°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb 4°)
 • Venus Sextile Jupiter (orb 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 5°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb 5°)
 • Sun Square IC (orb 5°)
 • Sun Square MC (orb 5°)
 • Chiron Sextile Ascendant (orb 6°)
 • Neptune Sextile IC (orb 6°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb 6°)
 • Mercury Square Jupiter (orb 6°)
 • Moon Square Mars (orb 6°)
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb 6°)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb 6°)
 • Neptune Trine MC (orb 6°)
 • Sun Trine Moon (orb 6°)
 • Jupiter Opposition MC (orb 7°)
 • Jupiter Conjunction IC (orb 7°)

4. Chart Patterns
 • T-Square involving:
  – MC in 4° Sagittarius, Mercury in 5° Pisces, and IC in 4° Gemini (with Jupiter at 11° Gemini and Sun at 29° Aquarius participating)
 • T-Square involving:
  – Moon in 23° Libra, Mars in 17° Cancer, and Chiron in 20° Aries
 • Cradle formation involving:
  – Jupiter in 11° Gemini, MC in 4° Sagittarius, Pluto in 2° Aquarius, Venus in 7° Aries, and IC in 4° Gemini

5. Special Chart Features
 • The Moon is a waning gibbous, a timing factor that can influence emotional tone.
 • The overall chart exhibits a “bucket shape” distribution.
 • The air element is dominant among the inner planets, though none fall in an earth sign.
 • There is an even distribution among the Cardinal, Mutable, and Fixed modes for the inner planets.
 • A concentration of planets in the lower left quadrant.
 • Pluto is on the horizon (rising) in terms of its energy.
 • Jupiter and the IC lie on the Nadir.
 • Sextile aspects are the most frequent (10 occurrences).
 • Both the Sun and MC are involved in 10 different aspects.
 • Neptune in Pisces is in the sign of its rulership.

This listing includes the planetary placements, house placements (with Melissa represented on the Ascendant and Stefan via the 9th house, with its ruler Mars in Cancer), the key aspects with their orbs, noted chart patterns, and special features. Provide further instructions when ready to proceed with detailed interpretations based on this data.

4. Chart Patterns

  – MC in 4° Sagittarius, Mercury in 5° Pisces, and IC in 4° Gemini (with Jupiter at 11° Gemini and Sun at 29° Aquarius participating)
 • T-Square involving:

 • The overall chart exhibits a “bucket shape” distribution.

 • There is an even distribution among the Cardinal, Mutable, and Fixed modes for the inner planets.
 • A concentration of planets in the lower left quadrant.

This listing includes the planetary placements, house placements (with Melissa represented on the Ascendant and Stefan via the 9th house, with its ruler Mars in Cancer), the key aspects with their orbs, noted chart patterns, and special features. Provide further instructions when ready to proceed with detailed interpretations based on this data.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
adjusts my shawl and peers intently at the horary chart before me

My dear, this chart speaks volumes about Stefan's thoughts and feelings toward you. traces fingers along the aspects

The most striking feature is Mars (Stefan's significator as ruler of his 9th house) being retrograde in Cancer in the 6th house. This placement reveals intense, yet conflicted emotions. Cancer is a deeply emotional and nurturing sign, but Mars here is uncomfortable - especially in retrograde. He is struggling with powerful feelings that he feels he must suppress or hide.

The Mars-Saturn trine suggests he maintains strict control over these feelings, likely due to his marriage. However, Mars square Chiron and square Moon shows internal turmoil and emotional wounding around these suppressed desires.

leans forward, voice lowering

Venus in Aries in your 2nd house, making favorable aspects to Jupiter and Pluto, speaks of passionate physical attraction and desire. He finds you extremely appealing on a primal level. The Venus-Jupiter sextile particularly hints at opportunities for pleasure and indulgence.

The concentration of planets in your 1st house - including Sun, Mercury, Saturn, Neptune and North Node - suggests you occupy a great deal of his thoughts. The Sun-Mercury conjunction there indicates he frequently thinks about communicating with you.

pauses thoughtfully

The bucket pattern with Pluto as the handle in your 12th house is quite revealing - there are deep, transformative feelings he keeps hidden, even from himself. These feelings have the potential to emerge suddenly and dramatically.

The T-Square involving Moon-Mars-Chiron speaks to emotional tension and inner conflict about acting on his desires. He likely feels torn between his attraction to you and his existing commitments.

sits back with a knowing look

In summary, my dear, Stefan harbors intense romantic and sexual feelings toward you, but actively works to suppress them due to his marriage. His thoughts about you are frequent and passionate, though he strives to maintain control. There is potential for these feelings to eventually surface in an explosive way, particularly with Pluto's influence.

Would you like me to elaborate on any particular aspect of this reading?
